1.title: Everything Wrong with Mamma Mia: Here We Go Again
1.plot: The movie is terrible and everyone involved should feel terrible.

2.title: Everything Wrong with Hereditary in 13 Minutes or Less
2.plot: Hereditary is freaky, creepy, original, and features some great performances. But it still has sins.

3.title: Everything Wrong with The Equalizer 2 in 17 Minutes or Less
3.plot: We enjoyed The Equalizer with Denzel. Most people did. But this Equalizer 2 sequel is NOTHING like the first movie. It's weird and long and so full of sins it makes your brain hurt.

4.title: Everything Wrong with The House with a Clock in Its Walls
4.plot: Well, here's a Goosebumps knock-off directed by that gore-porn horror guy, Eli Roth. The results are as messy as you'd expect. And tons of sins.

5.title: Everything Wrong with The Happening in 21 Minutes or Less

6.title: Everything Wrong with The Village in 15 Minutes or Less
6.plot: In observance in Glass, a new M. Night movie, we decided to go looking for sins in The Village. And holy hell - we found some. Like - holy hell.

7.title: Everything Wrong with The Predator
7.plot: It's almost like no one knows how to make a good Predator movie except John McTiernan. And honestly - that dude is available - so what's up?

8.title: Everything Wrong with Smallfoot
8.plot: Getting kind of tired of these lazy-ass animated movies masquerading as real movies. Smallfoot has sins - is lame - film at eleven.

9.title: Everything Wrong with Eragon in 14 Minutes or Less
9.plot: Ooph. Just - don't ever watch this movie. Use that 2 hours for something you will enjoy and remember and not want to kill with fire.

10.title: Everything Wrong with Christopher Robin
10.plot: This movie isn't terrible. It's just not as good as it wants to be. It's trying hard, I'll give it that. But it's no Paddington.

11.title: Everything Wrong with What Women Want
11.plot: Just - I mean - how did we even - so recently - and with all the - how did this - I mean - seriously?

1.title: Everything Wrong with the Amazing Spiderman in 2 Minutes
1.plot: CinemaSins' Jeremy Scott points out all the "sins" featured in "The Amazing Spider-Man" (2012).

2.title: Everything Wrong with the Avengers in 3 Minutes or Less
2.plot: Marvel's The Avengers was one of the biggest movies of the year, but it wasn't without sin. Cinema Sins lists all the sins for The Avengers (in 3 minutes or less) and hands down an ultimate verdict for the film.

3.title: Everything Wrong with the Dark Knight Rises in 3 Minutes or Less
3.plot: For all it's popularity and massive box office earnings, The Dark Knight Rises is still a film with many sins. We've listed them for you.

4.title: Everything Wrong with Prometheus in 4 Minutes or Less
4.plot: Do Prometheus fans exist? We certainly expect to find out. Here are all the sins we counted in Ridley Scott's Prometheus. We had to stretch our time limit to 4 minutes for this one - just too many darn sins.

5.title: Everything Wrong with the Hunger Games in 3 Minutes or Less
5.plot: Did you love The Hunger Games movie? You probably read the book. Here are the sins we found in the box office hit, The Hunger Games, recounted in three minutes or less.

6.title: Everything Wrong with Looper in 3 Minutes or Less
6.plot: Looper. You either loved it or hated it. Or, if you're like us, you wrote down a list of sins you found in the film.

7.title: Everything Wrong with Avatar in 4 Minutes or Less
7.plot: Who said we only did new movies? Avatar is the highest-grossing film of all time, but that doesn't mean it's free from sin.

8.title: Everything Wrong with the Room in 8 Minutes or Less
8.plot: We take on the so-called "worst movie ever made": The Room, which several of you have requested. How bad is it? Well, it's so bad, half the Cinema Sins team hasn't even watched it to this day. We also might have broken the sin counter with this one, but we're looking into getting it fixed.

9.title: Everything Wrong with Harry Potter & the Sorcerer's Stone in 3 Minutes or Less
9.plot: Is Harry Potter awesome? Maybe. It's not for us to say. But is it sin-free? Certainly not. We take a look at the very first chapter in this cinematic saga, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, and chart all the sins we can find - in 3 minutes or less.

10.title: Everything Wrong with the Last Airbender in 4 Minutes or Less
10.plot: You asked for it. Some of you begged. And in order to make this, we had to watch this movie multiple times - so thanks for that. Here are all the sins we found in The Last Airbender, a movie that should be a sin sentence all of its own.

-1.title: Everything Wrong with The Meg in 16 Minutes or Less
